gw.api.reinsurance

Interface RIAttachment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRIAttachment, RILossDateAttachment

    public interface RIAttachment
    RIAttachment An attachment of a reinsurable risk to a reinsurance agreement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
